change.changenote: Section 1 was enacted by 2010-17-1, effective February 23, 2011 (BC Reg 47/2011).
Section 2 was enacted by 2010-17-2, effective July 30, 2010 (BC Reg 251/2010).
Sections 3 to 5 were enacted by 2010-17-3 to 5, effective February 23, 2011 (BC Reg 47/2011).
Section 6 was enacted by 2010-17-6, effective November 23, 2012 (BC Reg 336/2012).
Sections 7 to 15 were enacted by 2010-17-7 to 15, effective February 23, 2011 (BC Reg 47/2011).
Sections 16 to 21 [conseq] were enacted by 2010-17-16 to 21, effective February 23, 2011 (BC Reg 47/2011).
